title: Can you not buy chromas with ip anymore?
body: I cant buy chromas with ip anymore. Did they remove it. Sorry i was gone for like 2 weeks and dont know if they took it away.

replies.body:
The Chroma IP sale was only for a limited time. These special IP sales only happen twice a year, as mentioned on our [Chroma 1.1 FAQ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/chromas#faq), so you'll have to stick around for the next one.

Let me know if you have any questions.
